descript.abstract: This point layer represents the locations of pedestrian ramps in Boston, MA.
descript.purpose: This layer is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.3.3600

procstep.procdesc: Name changed from SIDEWALK_PEDESTRIAN_RAMP to BostonPedestrianRamp12.

attr.attrdef: Calculated network priority ranking for each ramp point. This value will be used to prioritize ramp repairs. The current formula is as follows: NPR = 1 / MBTA + BRA_USE (Priority Code) + Ramp material (Priority Code) + Apron % diff.
